data.meta_description: FIFA Mobile is now EA SPORTS FCâ¢ Mobile Soccer! The World's Game, in your pocket. UEFA EURO 2024â¢ Tournament is now live & CONMEBOL COPA AmÃ©rica content is on tâ¦
data.text:
Play UEFA EURO 2024â¢ & CONMEBOL Copa AmÃ©ricaâ¢ now as we celebrate the Summer of Soccer! Collect the worldâs best soccer players & make your own path to glory!

FIFA Mobile is now EA SPORTS FCâ¢ Mobile Soccer! The World's Game, in your pocket. UEFA EURO 2024â¢ Tournament is now live & CONMEBOL COPA AmÃ©rica content is on the way as we celebrate the Summer of Football!

Train and build your dream Football Ultimate Teamâ¢ of soccer legends and put them to the test. Collect Player Items of world-class talent like Erling Haaland, Jude Bellingham, Virgil van Dijk, and Son Heung-min. Take control in the latest version of your favourite online soccer game.

Manage teams from your favourite soccer league â Real Madrid from LALIGA EA SPORTSâ¢, Manchester City from the Premier League, and many more. Score goals with some of your favourite players as you level up your dream team of soccer stars from the 23/24 season. Join a league with your friends & compete against the best in PvP games including Head-to-Head, VS Attack and Manager Mode.

Join the next generation of soccer legends with EA SPORTS FC.

NEXT-LEVEL GAMEPLAY

- True Player Personality: Reflecting authentic player characteristics, with tangible attribute impact and animation diversity

- Dynamic Game Speed: Mobile-first and tactile game speed, allowing for a more exciting sports game experience

- Elite Shooting System: Realistic shot system allows impact players to make their mark

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS & WATCH LEAGUE MATCHES LIVE

- Join a league with friends and challenge them to a match

- Share your league match broadcasts so your league mates can watch live

- Watch your league mates compete in their H2H matches, or watch the recording for up to a week post match

- Start a League Tournament and battle other Leagues to top the leaderboard

IMMERSIVE NEXT-LEVEL SOCCER GAME

- Immersive Broadcast Experience bringing an authentic feel to your online soccer games

- Discover new dynamic cameras and impactful replays

- Soccer fans can experience realistic stadium SFX and live on-field commentary

- Unlock stadiums and weather modes for an enhanced soccer matchday

SOCCER LEGENDS, LEAGUES & COMPETITIONS

- EA SPORTS FC MOBILE is home to the biggest competitions, leagues, and players across the worldâs game with more than 15,000 fully licensed players, 650+ teams, and 30+ leagues

- Premier League, UEFA Champions League, LALIGA EASPORTS, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, Serie A, , and many more are playable throughout the season

- Get on the pitch with world soccer stars: Erling Haaland, Jude Bellingham, Virgil van Dijk, Son Heung-min and many more

- Play with soccer legends and ICONs: Ronaldinho, Steven Gerrard & Wayne Rooney

UCL TOURNAMENT MODE

- Play the Champions League with all 32 qualified teams

- Experience the authentic UCL broadcasting package, UCL stadium art, official UCL ball and the iconic trophy ceremony

FIFA Mobile is now FC Mobile! Welcome to the club.

This app: Requires acceptance of EAâs Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://tos.ea.com/legalapp/WEBPRIVACYCA/US/en/PC/. Requires an Internet connection (network fees may apply). Includes in-game advertising. Allows players (above the minimum age of digital consent in their country) to communicate via League chat; to disable for users under the age of majority with League chat access, use your device's parental controls. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Game Center. Log out of Game Center before installation if you donât want to share your game play with friends. This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items, including a random selection of virtual in-game items. FC Points not available in Belgium.

User Agreement: terms.ea.com

Privacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com

Visit help.ea.com for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features after 30 daysâ notice posted on ea.com/service-updates.

The UEFA EURO 2024â¢ Update is here! Join us for the Summer of Soccer. Play the UEFA EURO 2024â¢ Tournament mode, and upgrade your Ultimate Teamâ¢ using the new Training Transfer feature.

OFFICIAL UEFA EURO 2024 TOURNAMENT

Play through the entire authentic UEFA EURO 2024 Tournament with all 24 qualified National Teams. This new mode includes UEFA EURO 2024 National Team kits and crests, the official match ball, and the ability to play in two new authentic UEFA EURO 2024 stadiums:

- Olympiastadion Berlin

- BVB Stadion Dortmund

Youâll also notice a new UEFA EURO 2024 Tournament user interface and broadcast package to further immerse you in the action, alongside custom UEFA EURO 2024 commentary!

TRAINING TRANSFER

You asked, and we listened! Weâre excited to bring this highly-requested feature to our latest update.

With Training Transfer, you will unlock the ability to transfer Training XP between your players, giving you more squad-building flexibility. Youâll use Training Transfer Tokens, a new in-game currency, to make this possible.

EXTRA TIME

A new hub with additional activities is coming to FC Mobile! Available starting June 13, 2024, UTC, check out the âDaily Picksâ event for new rewards and deals.

Enter the feature from the home screen and discover Player Deals at various reward pools, costs, and rotation cycles. Your selected reward will be sent to your inbox and be ready for you to claim.

GAMEPLAY IMPROVEMENTS

- Slow Defender Turning: Addressed the issue of slow defender movement when decelerating and changing direction.

- Defender Slowdown After Switching: Improved on the issue where a defender would sidestep and interrupt his run after being switched.

- Ground Through Passes Overshooting: Corrected the issue with gesture and button ground passes overshooting from close to mid-range distances.

- Ball Colour: Adjusted the lighting and colour of all balls to make them more visible in the game.

- Jude Bellingham Signature Celebration: Introducing the new Jude Bellingham Signature Celebration! Available when you score with his UEFA EURO 2024â¢ Live Event Player Item or with him in the UEFA EURO 2024â¢ Tournament Mode.

BUG FIXES

- Reduced in-game network errors and crashes.

- Fixed an issue with a stadium displaying incorrectly.

- Fixed some backgrounds in the Locker Room.

- Improved the display of tiles on the Division Rivals page.

See you on the pitch!
